original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 322.40/50 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 322.40/50 to the US dollar on Monday from 322.45/65 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.40/60 percent from 13.50/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.02.2026, closed at 13.75/85 percent from 13.75/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed stable at 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.03.2028 closed at 14.15/25 percent from 14.15/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.07.2029 closed at 14.20/40 percent from 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.20/35 percent from 14.15/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed stable at 14.20/35 percent . (Colombo/Jan8/2024)
